name: trailframes-monorepo
description: TrailFrames - root monorepo to manage front and back

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.ts:check: npm run ts:check:back && npm run ts:check:front
scripts.errors:check:back: cd backend && npx tsc --noEmit && npx eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0
scripts.errors:check:front: cd frontend && npx tsc --noEmit && npx eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0
scripts.errors:check: npm run errors:check:back && npm run errors:check:front
